army_loaned_notification.comment: Shows when we get an event of an army loaned. Only show if parent context visible so wont show if diplomacy not currently showing though

available.name: available
available.tooltip: Army available||You can request an army from this ally and gain temporary control over it.||{{tr:war_coordination_click_to_access}}

localised_text.tooltip_text: Cost||This amount will be deducted from your {{tr:icon_treasury}}{{tr:treasury}} in order to construct this building.

callback_with_context.context_function_id: GetIfElse(IsEmpty && ShouldShowCategoriesPopup, self.SetProperty("mouseover", "building_categories_popup"), GetIfElse(CanShowUpgradeOptions, self.SetProperty("mouseover", "building_construction_popup"), self.SetProperty("mouseover", "")))

this | PlayersFaction.TreasuryAmount < MoveToSettlementCost(StoredContextFromParent("CcoCampaignSettlement")) => Loc("StratHudbutton_Cannot_Recruit_Unit2") | AllyPermittedSettlementList.Size == 0 =>Loc("outpost_no_valid_region") | StoredContextFromParent("CcoCampaignSettlement").IsUnderSiege => Loc("outpost_cannot_move_under_siege") | IsContextValid(AlliedSettlementContext.AlliedForeignSlotList(PlayerFactionContext).FirstContext.ConstructionItemContext) => Loc("outpost_cannot_move_while_building") | Loc("outpost_move_tooltip")

localised_text.tooltip_text: Demolish the [[img:icon_outpost]][[/img]]outpost. This may have diplomatic repercussions.

Gain control over this army for a number of turns. The ally will re-gain control once this time runs out, if the alliance is broken or the army's [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord dies. You cannot request an army led by a faction leader.

callback_with_context.context_function_id: slot = StoredContextFromParent("CcoCampaignBuildingSlot") | slot.IsBuildingNew || slot.IsUpgrading || slot.IsRepairing => "UI_CAM_HUD_Construction_Cancel" | slot.IsDismantling => "UI_CLICK_Cancel_Decline" | slot.CanUpgrade && self.ParentContext.Id != "slot_entry" && !slot.IsEmpty && self.CurrentState == "hover" => "UI_CLICK_Building_Upgrade" | slot.IsEmpty && self.CurrentState == "hover" => "UI_CLICK_Construction_Start"

localised_text.tooltip_text: Cost||This amount will be deducted from your {{tr:icon_treasury}}{{tr:treasury}} in order to construct this building.

details_frame.comment: This initialises details with selected mission, but if no selectable missions gets the current active mission via CurrentTargetRequestContext to show that instead

client_state_player.name: client_state_player
client_state_player.tooltip: You are a tributary state of this faction

vassal_player.name: vassal_player
vassal_player.tooltip: You are a vassal of this faction

far.name: far
far.tooltip: You share an enemy with this faction that is far away.||The closer this settlement is to a shared enemy the cheaper recruitment will be. However, the [[img:icon_outpost]][[/img]]outpost will be lost if the settlement is lost to the enemy.

middle.name: middle
middle.tooltip: You share an enemy with this faction that is fairly close.||The closer this settlement is to a shared enemy the cheaper recruitment will be. However, the [[img:icon_outpost]][[/img]]outpost will be lost if the settlement is lost to the enemy.

near.name: near
near.tooltip: You share an enemy with this faction that is very close.||The closer this settlement is to a shared enemy the cheaper recruitment will be. However, the [[img:icon_outpost]][[/img]]outpost will be lost if the settlement is lost to the enemy.

no_shared_enemy.name: no_shared_enemy
no_shared_enemy.tooltip: You do not share an enemy with this ally.||The closer this settlement is to a shared enemy the cheaper recruitment will be. However, the [[img:icon_outpost]][[/img]]outpost will be lost if the settlement is lost to the enemy.

dy_allegiance.componentleveltooltip: Passive income: [[img:icon_allegiance]][[/img]]{{CcoCampaignFactionInteraction:FavourPointsChangePerTurn}}||Allegiance indicates how much support this ally is willing to give you against your shared enemies. It slowly increases over time and can be increased by completing missions.

callback_with_context.context_function_id: this | IsHuman && IsContextValid(NetworkPlayerContext) => NetworkPlayerContext.Name | CultureContext.GroupByCulture => CultureContext.Name | SubcultureContext.Name

component_text.text: They have loaned their army to you.

favour_frame.componentleveltooltip: Passive income: [[img:icon_allegiance]][[/img]]{{CcoCampaignFactionInteraction:FavourPointsChangePerTurn}}||Allegiance indicates how much support this ally is willing to give you against your shared enemies. It slowly increases over time and can be increased by completing missions.

localised_text.tooltip_text: Building health||This building is damaged. It can either be fully repaired for a cost, or slowly repair itself over time.

newstate.name: NewState
newstate.tooltip: Horde||This faction is a horde, made up of armies, owning no regions.

icon_attrition.componentleveltooltip: This garrison is suffering [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attrition due to being under siege.
This garrison is suffering [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attrition due to being under siege.

icon_turns.componentleveltooltip: Turns remaining for ally to defend this target

localised_text.tooltip_text: Construction turns left||You are currently building this item.

list_box.comment: We listen for campaign selections and use selection to allow selection of armies to loan in 3d space

mission_pending.componentleveltooltip: Ally mission available||This ally has requested your assistance.||{{tr:war_coordination_click_to_access}}

available.name: available
available.tooltip: Outpost available||You can construct an [[img:icon_outpost]][[/img]]outpost in a major settlement of this ally. This will give you access to allied recruitment.||{{tr:war_coordination_click_to_access}}

localised_text.tooltip_text: Sort by available war coordination actions

callback_with_context.context_function_id: slot = StoredContextFromParent("CcoCampaignBuildingSlot") | slot.IsBuildingNew || slot.IsUpgrading || slot.IsRepairing => "UI_CAM_HUD_Construction_Cancel" | slot.IsDismantling => "UI_CLICK_Cancel_Decline" | slot.CanUpgrade || slot.CanConvert && self.ParentContext.Id != "slot_entry" && !slot.IsEmpty && self.CurrentState == "hover" => "UI_CLICK_Building_Upgrade" | slot.IsEmpty && self.CurrentState == "hover" => { slot.CharacterContext.MilitaryForceContext.ForceType == "MALAKAI_BOUND_HORDE" | "UI_CAM_DWF_SpiritOfGrugni" | "UI_CLICK_Construction_Start" }

subpanel_ally_missions.comment: Sends message when visibility of panel changes so can refresh any UI that only shows on this like those using ShouldShowWarCoordinationPendingRequest function

subpanel_request_army.comment: Not done campaign side yet so hiding for now!

tab_missions.componentleveltooltip: Assist your ally by completing missions, gaining [[img:icon_allegiance]][[/img]]allegiance as a reward.
tab_missions.comment: Only active if have a mission accepted or some pending to accept

inactive.name: inactive
inactive.tooltip: Assist your ally by completing missions, gaining [[img:icon_allegiance]][[/img]]allegiance as a reward.||[[col:red]]This option is only available when your ally is an AI that has requested help. You will only receive requests if you have at least one shared enemy.[[/col]]

tab_outpost.componentleveltooltip: Construct, upgrade or move an [[img:icon_outpost]][[/img]]outpost to recruit some of your ally's units.

inactive.name: inactive
inactive.tooltip: Construct, upgrade or move an [[img:icon_outpost]][[/img]]outpost to recruit some of your ally's units.||[[col:red]]This faction has no settlements available. Outposts can only be constructed in province capitals where other factions have not constructed outposts.[[/col]]

tab_request_army.componentleveltooltip: Request an army from your ally, taking control over it for a limited amount of time.
tab_request_army.comment: When click on panel to open, we also select and zoom to first character by default. Dont do this via selection as we dont want to zoom away from army when we press to loan, as would go to next available army which we dont want

inactive.name: inactive
inactive.tooltip: Request an army from your ally, taking control over it for a limited amount of time.||[[col:red]]This option is only available with a [[img:icon_military_alliance]][[/img]]military alliance or [[img:icon_vassal]][[/img]]vassalage treaty and the ally is an AI that has an eligible army. Faction leaders cannot be requested.[[/col]]

tab_set_target.componentleveltooltip: Coordinate with your ally by setting a war coordination target. Targeting your own assets will result in your ally defending them.

inactive.name: inactive
inactive.tooltip: You can not give a war target to another human player.

callback_with_context.context_function_id: Loc("current_target") + GetIfElse(IsOfType(CurrentTargetContext, "CcoCampaignSettlement") && CurrentTargetContext.IsAbandoned, Format(" %S", CurrentTargetContext.Name), Format(" %S (%S)", CurrentTargetContext.Name, CurrentTargetContext.FactionName))

localised_text.tooltip_text: Required technology not yet researched.||Left-click to display the technology chain for this item.

template_faction.componentleveltooltip: Left-click to select, double left-click to zoom to capital

localised_text.tooltip_text: Required settlement level for this building to automatically construct
Construction turns left||You are currently building this item.
Turns to cycle to this level

component_text.text: This faction has no settlements available. Outposts can only be constructed in province capitals where other factions have not constructed outposts.

war_coordination_panel.comment: Ensures war coordination targetting hidden when leave panel, and updates all children when get war coordination state change events to refresh all ui rather than all ui listening for event individually!

none.name: none
none.tooltip: War coordination target available||You can set a war coordination target for this ally.||{{tr:war_coordination_click_to_access}}

callback_with_context.context_function_id: Loc("current_target") + GetIfElse(IsOfType(CurrentTargetContext, "CcoCampaignSettlement") && CurrentTargetContext.IsAbandoned, Format(" %S", CurrentTargetContext.Name), Format(" %S (%S)", CurrentTargetContext.Name, CurrentTargetContext.FactionName)) + Format(" %s", "{{tr:war_coordination_click_to_access}}")
